name: (2021AU-2-5) Code Name: Custodian
description:
This is a university-level student project, so please keep that in mind when leaving comments. Friendly, constructive feedback is of immense value to help our teams become more effective developers! We appreciate your time and attention as a player!

On an unknown planet, you control a cleaning mercenary Robot, Code Name: Custodian. You earned this code name due to your back history as being a custodian robot.  You are hired by the Gorgus Government to destroy the race of aliens, known simply as the Sponge (ironically), that have infiltrated this planet’s civilization. Explore the environment in disrepair and get swept into the tale.  Defeat your enemies by using your cleaning prowess. Collect power-ups, to eliminate the infiltration, show the Government what you are made of, perhaps one last time.  The nuclear bomb facility is your target.  It has a control that will self-destruct the planet, find it,  make it there in one piece… but know that the Sponge will not go down without a fight.  

The Sponge Infestation: It came from a foreign body, an asteroid that crashed into the planet.  Whoever was not killed by the initial impact, were taken over, infected by the alien race known as the Sponge.  Little is known about how they function, except that the spread like a virus or a mold via their excretions and disfigure whomever they infect into their image.

As of right now, using numpad keys will change to the following prototypes

(Scenes must be accessed via numpad keys for now, regular number keys above the letters won't work, sorry!)

0-Start Menu (Start button is not functional, use numpad)

1-Healthbar prototypes and enemy models (test health bars with D and Spacebar)

2-Lose Screen

3-Enemy AI Demo (press s to shoot)

4-Player Model

5-Player Movement Prototype

6-Terrain Model

7- Rocks and foliage

8-Credits

(alt tab or alt f4 to exit game)
